mapper.insert: insert into review (product_id, user_id, content, rating) values (#{product_id}, #{user_id}, #{content}, #{rating});
mapper.select: select product_id, product_name from product where product_id = #{product_id};
select count(*) from review where user_id = #{user_id} and product_id = #{product_id}
select count(*) from orders o inner join order_product op on o.order_id = op.order_id where o.status = '배송완료' and o.user_id = #{user_id} and op.product_id = #{product_id};
